item.title: Automating the implementation of a DevSecOps Pipeline - PART 01
item.description: Hola, fine folks! This isn’t any typical university project, we’re partnering up with the unstoppable @M0DY4S to bring you a graded project that will inspire you to embrace the magic of DevSecOps. Introduction: Picture this: software development practices evolving like a Pok√©mon on steroids, giving birth to the legendary concepts of DevOps and its sidekick, DevSecOps. They’re like Batman and Robin, but for software development. DevOps focuses on collaboration and integration between development and operations teams, turbocharging software delivery speed and reliability.
